GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles, with optional sorting, ordering, filtering by topic, and pagination.
queries: sort_by (string, optional): column to sort by (defaults to created_at)
order (string, optional): sort order ('asc' or 'desc', defaults to 'desc')
topic (string, optional): filter articles by topic
limit (number, optional): limit the number of articles per page (defaults to 10)
page (number, optional): specify the page number (defaults to 1)

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves a specific article by its ID.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comments for a specific article ID, with optional pagination.
queries: limit (number, optional): limit the number of comments per page (defaults to 10)
page (number, optional): specify the page number (defaults to 1)

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment to a specific article ID.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes of a specific article ID.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a specific comment by its ID.

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates the votes of a specific comment ID.

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users.

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves a specific user by their username.

requestBody.author: string (required, must be an existing user)

requestBody.topic: string (required, must be an existing topic)
